channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Big dip in road, 3rd October
item.description:
There is a big dip in the road that first began about 2 weeks ago and is now getting worse and bigger looking like it will collapse in
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maximfeldt Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New pedestrian junction causing multiple tyre blow outs, 3rd October
item.description:
Since this new junction has been put in place I have witnessed multiple cars experience tyre blow out when they accidentally clip the edge of the new pavement. None of these have been caused by speeding or reckless driving. This corners of this new pedestrian junction need to be addressed as the car tyre blow outs present a risk to pedestrians in the area which was not the case prior to this intervention
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): George Lane, Hither Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Ambassador Court. 30 Holmdale Road, NW6 1RY, 3rd October
item.description:
Slender tree leaning over roadway. Seems vulnerable to uprooting in high winds

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Holmdale Road, West Hampstead, London

item.title: Bus shelter 0111 3776 at bus stop T Greenwich Park towards Greenwich Or New Cross : shelter light out, 3rd October
item.description:
Bus shelter 0111 3776 at bus stop T Greenwich Park towards Greenwich Or New Cross : shelter light out A very dark location in middle of Blackheath Common - been out for a week or so now See attached photographs Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shooters Hill Road, Blackheath, London

item.title: The information of the Close names is incorrect, 3rd October
item.description:
URGENT - The information on the signs for Lydford estate is incorrect the 'Close' names have been swapped around the Postman has been delivering mail to the incorrect Close. The Error shows the signs have placed Portgate Close as the third square from Harrow road it is the 2nd. Please check on Google maps for the correct information this needs to bee looked into AS SOON AS POSSIBLE and the signage that is up needs to be removed prevent further confusion. URGENT

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Portgate Close, Maida Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
